meta.description: With Prana Air adult-kid pollution mask N95 for anti-dust, let your child wear N95 face mask with 5 layers HEPA+ carbon filter

blueSection.paragraph1: Does your kid often complain about headaches? Is he/she suffering from cough and cold every now and then?
blueSection.paragraph2: If yes, Air Pollution could possibly be the reason.

box.alt: Prana Air junior pollution mask box

boxBack.alt: Prana Air children mask box backview

parts.alt: Prana Air children pollution mask parts

banner.title: Did you know that more than 90% of children are breathing toxic air every day?
banner.imageAlt: Boy and girl wearing adult-kid mask

product.title: Adult-Kid Pollution Mask
product.description: The best N95 anti-pollution mask for children to keep maximum protection to them from breathing dangerous polluted air particles

hepaFilter.title: 5 Layer HEPA Filter
hepaFilter.description: Grade 11 HEPA filters pollen, smoke, and fine dust particles as small as PM 2.5

efficiency.title: 95.99% Efficiency
efficiency.description: Advanced filtration technology enables our air mask for anti-polluion to capture 95.99% polluted air particles.

fanSpeed.title: 3 Different Fan Speed
fanSpeed.description: The air volume can be adjusted as per the child's commuting to and from school, or going anywhere outdoor, etc.

ventilators.title: 2 Micro Ventilators
ventilators.description: Allows kids to breathe fresh purified air from one side and breathe out the carbon dioxide from the other side.

usbCharging.title: USB Charging
usbCharging.description: Comes with micro-USB charging cable that allows the mask function within 1.5 to 2 hours.

batteryEfficiency.title: Battery Efficiency
batteryEfficiency.description: Runs on a 5-V lithium battery with an average of 8 hours long battery life daily.

description.part1: Adults/Children can wear it at school or any outdoor activity.
description.part2: No more worrying about catching airborne health issues.
description.part3: Suitable for children aged between 5 and 15 years. The mask comes with two different size of seals - large and small, that can easily fit to adults and children.
